articles.title: Rich countries deliberately kept vaccines from Africa, says telecoms billionaire Strive Masiyiwa - News24
articles.description: Strive Masiyiwa, the telecommunications billionaire tasked with helping the AU secure Covid-19 vaccines, said the shortage of doses on the continent was a consequence of deliberate action by the world’s richest nations.
